com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:title: Tone Frequency
com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:summary: The audio frequency that tones will be played at

com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:title: Points added after an correct guess
com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:summary: The higher this is set the faster new letters will be introduced

com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:title: Mastery Score Threshold
com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:summary: Increase this to slow the rate at which new letters are introduced. Once all letters have scores above this threshold a new letter will be introduced.

com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:title: Points removed after an incorrect guess
com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:summary: Points penalized for an incorrect guess. The letters' mastery score which would have triggered a correct guess will have points docked.

com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:title: Tone fade-in/fade-out control
com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.FormattingSe.app:summary: This settings can help alleviate 'clicking' sounds at the beginning and/or end of tones. Slowly increase this setting until you no longer hear the clicks

com.uberj.ditsanddahs.views.ConfirmReset.app:title: Reset App Settings
